```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## This script is for the Pubmed database

```{bash}
cd /data/databases/pubmed
ls -1 | awk '{sub(/\./," ")}1' | awk '{gsub(/_stats/,"",$1); print $2}' | sort | uniq -c

```

The unique abstracts of Pubmed are:

```{bash}
more pubmed_ids.tsv | gawk '!seen[$0]++' | wc -l 
```
